name: Antithesis Verge
description:
Caution - The Following game is made in the pure essence of a jam to learn  new mechanics and have fun with them, It can be quite buggy at time, so please do keep that in mind when Playing this game. 

Note : - This is a playable demo! Will expand upon this, so please do leave feedback. Do Try out level 4 from level menu, the UI on level 3 is not fixed.
You control Sura, a Thief with a connection with the dark world. She has a debt to pay and she uses her abilities to rob as much as possible.

She can tear Holes in the wall to phase between different dimensions, The whole game is around this mechanic!
Other Side can be used to uncover switch connections, Control Panels and much more. Controls

A - Left
D - Right
Space - Jump
W - Interact 
Left Mouse Button - Dash 
E - Tear a hole into the OTHERSIDE
